headlines.description: Patrick Bamford celebrated his England call-up with the equaliser on Sunday as Leeds United came back for a 1-1 draw at Burnley.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bamford earns Leeds a point after battle with Burnley

headlines.description: Tottenham moved to the top of the table with a 1-0 win over Watford as Harry Kane made his first league start of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tottenham go top as Son strike sees off Watford

headlines.description: Manchester United scraped past Wolverhampton Wanderers 1-0 thanks to a late Mason Greenwood goal at the Molineux Stadium on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Solskjaer marks 100th game with win vs. Wolves
